main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Managua, Nicaragua, on August 13, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed moving from northwest to southeast at high speed without noise., Witnesses described the object as brilliant and luminous, leaving a trail resembling chemical propellant., The sighting was confirmed by multiple unqualified observers and generated local rumors of possible Soviet reconnaissance., There were additional reports of unidentified flying objects over Managua and Leon around the same time., The investigation into the sightings was not completed, leaving the identity of the objects unresolved.
witness description: unqualified observers including local newspaper sources
